modName: Immersive Content - Hearthfire  Manor Emittance Enhancment
summary: Adds emittion and dustbeams to the windows inside all the mansions you can build in the Hearthfire DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j183/Siomir/Skyrim%20Mod%20Pictures/Hearthfire%20Emittance%20Enhancement/emittancepage_zps7f6669b0.jpg[/img][/center]

Adds emittance to the windows inside all the mansions you can build in the Hearthfire DLC.
It bothered me a lot that this was not done and decided to do something about it and share it with the rest of you.

[b]Note:[/b]

If you have only built the mainhall on the house, you won't get the beams, i still have to figure out where to add the beams without getting duplicates when you extend your home, don't worry though, windows will get beams after you start building depending on which upgrade you choose, beams will not shine in to the mainhall if you chose extensions that covers the wall for example.

Also you will still get the tinted windows on all windows regardless of extension, im still working on it, finding out exactly which walls i have to remove emittance on is a pain in the backside.

[center][/center]

[center][img]http://i80.photobucket.com/albums/j183/Siomir/Skyrim%20Mod%20Pictures/Hearthfire%20Emittance%20Enhancement/1460972250_zpsb73f7daf.jpg[/img][/center]


Enjoi!
author: Necrocytosis

files.name: Version 0_1
files.changelogHtml: Adds Emittance to all windowed walls that came with the Hearthfire DLC.

files.name: Version 0_2 Blue Tint
files.changelogHtml:
Added emittance to statics which i forgot
Added fxambient dust beams to most windows
Added 2 options for you to download, blue tinted windows or white, pick whichever you prefer
Added new comparison images so it\'s easier for you to understand what this mod does.

files.name: Version 0_2 White
files.changelogHtml:
Added emittance to statics which i forgot
Added fxambient dust beams to most windows
Added 2 options for you to download, blue tinted windows or white, pick whichever you prefer
Added new comparison images so it\'s easier for you to understand what this mod does.

files.name: Version 0_3
files.changelogHtml: All Manors of the Hearthfire DLC is now enhanced with beams and emittance!

files.name: Version 0_3 Update
files.changelogHtml: All Manors of the Hearthfire DLC is now enhanced with beams and emittance!

files.name: Version 0_4 Beta
files.changelogHtml:
Added a few more lights to the house, not all places mind you, just a few to check for artifacts. lights i\'ve added so far: Armory, 2nd floor mainhall and the entrance hall.
Fixed the dust beams in the greenhouse and the kitchen.
Added a new imagespace that makes the manors seem a little warmer than they did.
Added a shadow caster to the fireplace in the mainhall for a more atmospheric feeling (that is at least my opinion)
